data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Bragança, Portugal a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bragança, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 5,236 believers in Bragança, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Bragança be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 5,236 believers in Bragança to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 5,236 believers in Bragança, Portugal a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Bragança, Portugal.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Bragança, Portugal has a population of 148,800.

We estimate Bragança has 5,236 people who might know Jesus, 132,833 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,731 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 148,800 people living in Bragança, Portugal. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
